FuncDef: The eth-test stop command stops an ETH-test instance.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a MEP on which an ETH-test instance is to be stopped.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 8191.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
ETH-test instances are performed to test parameters for a unidirectional on-demand service or during an on-demand-service interruption. An ETH-test instance will stop after the specified timeout period elapses. To stop an instance manually, run the eth-test stop command.
Prerequisites
The ETH-test function has been enabled using the eth-test enable command.An ETH-test instance has been enabled using the eth-test start command.
